profile:
We're  more then just handy. We are more then just handymen.
We are skilled trade professionals with a passion.

We're  always looking forward to our next project big or small and going beyond my customer's expectations and needs.
My brother and I saw the need and demand for reliable hard working tradesmen  with an eye for perfection.  
Our contractors are skilled in many aspects of the trades to complete all kinds of jobs BIG or SMALL.
 Sometimes we need to think out side the box like a true handy man! and other times you need to stick to the book!
​
We started  this  business to help improve, repair, &  maintain the value of people’s biggest investments, their homes!   

Services:

Gutter cleaning,  Product assembly (bbq gazebo patio set barbeque) drywall & repair, painting, framing, car detailing, ceiling fan installation, plumbing, electrical, landscaping, flooring (hardwood, click lock, tile) reno, demo, kitchen, bathroom, garbage cleanup, trim, light fixture, door locks, shed building, shingles, oil changes, brakes, lawn maintenance, in ground sprinklers,
name: The Handy Boydz

profile:
**Specializing in Open Concept Builds**
Open concept renovations are a type of floor plan where walls and doors are taken out and living spaces merge into one!
 
Cando Renovations Inc owned by Bert de Haan has been in business for over 45 years. We provide services to renovate all home and office renovations and we take pride in our work!
We always put the customer's needs first, with on-time and on budget renovations. 
 
 
Our services include:
**Load bearing wall removal and engineering** also known as Open Concept Projects
Custom kitchen & bathroom cabinets, Ceramic, Slate, Marble tile work, Plumbing, Gas fireplaces, In-floor heating.
 
We also are experts in a wheelchair- handicapped accessible renovations.  Windows, doors, siding. soffit facia, Skylights.
 
Call us for a free quote today! 416-989-3638
service_area: We service Oshawa, Whitby, Pickering,Toronto,Markham,Richmond Hill,Newmarket Thorn Hill

brands: All major brands Meon delta, American Standard, Maxx etc.
specialities: Load bearing wall removal and engineering, Custom bathrooms tempered glass showers. Tile work

profile:
Welcome to Rosales W&D, the purpose of this site is to assist You with finding the perfect product to Affordably Personalize your home.  With over 10 years experience, we can say that we have mastered our craft.  Our products are showcased around the City in residential homes and private estates.  Every year, thousands of clients choose us for their projects mainly because of our professionalism, attention to detail and our one of a kind buying experience which ensures customer satisfaction every time!  And if you're here, it's because you have not yet found what you're looking for.  We believe it's not enough to simply meet your expectations-we must exceed them.

*****
 
We take great pride in our wide variety of Products & Services such as Window Glass Replacements, Glass Shower Enclosures & Partitions, Mirrors, Glass Railings,
Wrought Iron Inserts, Decorative Glass Inserts, Door Systems etc.

*****
Rosales W&D has been servicing Toronto and the surrounding areas for many years.

*****

Rosales W&D
Delivering Quality to Your Home
 
rosaleswd@gmail.com

profile:
Silver Lining Handywork was founded by Ricardo and Claudia Almeida in 2011. 

Ricardo has over a decade of experience in the construction industry. Claudia has extensive experience in customer service and working in office environments.

We are a family-owned, business located in Whitby, ON, Canada. We mainly provide services in our home community of Durham Region.

Our company is dedicated to serving all your handywork needs. We offer experienced, diligent, reliable, efficient, and professional help with your renovation, small project, or "to do" list.

Silver Lining Handywork is a verified company on the Homestars website. We are proud to boast that we won the Homestars "Best of Award" in 2013 and 2014. Feel free to visit our profile on Homestars to read our customer reviews. You can also like us on Facebook, and follow us on Twitter and Instagram .

Silver Lining Handywork is also an eco-friendly company. We strive to be paperless whenever possible. We provide our customers with written electronic estimates and invoices. 

Silver Lining Handywork is your handyman company. We look forward to working with you soon.

call 905-556-0533 or email us directly at silverlininghandywork@gmail.com to set up a free estimate
services:
Silver Lining Handywork provides the following services:
•	Backsplash, Tiling, Grouting
•	Replacing outlets/switches, lights
•	Toilet and Sink plumbing, Caulking
•	Hanging pictures, mirrors, fixtures, blinds
•	Building/Repairing decks, gates
•	Painting, Staining, Sanding
•	Drywall repair

Free Estimates:
call 905-556-0533 or email us directly at silverlininghandywork@gmail.com to set up a free estimate
specialities:
Kitchens: 
*Replace sinks, faucets, range hoods, dish washers, light fixtures
*Paint walls, doors, trimmings and baseboards
*Tile and grout floors and backsplashes
*Caulk around sinks

Bathrooms:
*Replace sinks, toilets, faucets, and shower heads
*Install shower curtain rods, towel rods, and toilet paper holders
*Paint walls, doors, trimmings and baseboards
*Change fans, and light fixtures
*Hang pictures, mirrors, and towel hooks
*Tile and grout floors and walls
*Caulk around sinks, tubs, and showers

Bedrooms:
*Paint trimmings, doors, walls and baseboards
*Remodel closet (put up rods and shelving)
*Change light fixtures
*Hang pictures and mirrors

Living Rooms/Family Rooms/Dining Rooms:
*Paint walls, doors, trimmings and baseboards
*Change light fixtures
*Hang pictures and mirrors

Basements/Laundry Rooms:
*Paint walls, doors, trimmings and baseboards
*Install cabinets and counter tops
*Replace laundry tubs

Outdoors
*Deck building and repair
*Gate building and repair

Free Estimates:
call 905-556-0533 or email us directly at silverlininghandywork@gmail.com to set up a free estimate

profile:
Who We Are

Milestone Landscaping has been in operation right here in Toronto since 2003, offering a broad array of landscape, and construction management services to help clients preserve and improve their landscape investment.  Our clientele is very diverse ranging from corporations, institutions to privately owned homes. 
We Care About the Details

Milestone Landscaping pays special attention to the details of every project to ensure the complete satisfaction of each client. Our goal is to enhance the exterior of your home, raise your property value, and beautify your whole neighborhood.
Customer Satisfaction Guaranteed

Your satisfaction is our priority and we strive to provide a service we are proud of.  We start every project by providing a thorough consultation to understand your goals and the needs of the project. We do this to guarantee that the project is completed according to your preferences.
specialities:
-random layed interlock
-patterned interlock
-smooth finished concrete
-broom finished concrete
-creative design

profile: Grand Merit Construction provides renovation and handyman services. Working with a trusted team, we keep us accountable throughout the entire work. We keep an eye on workmanship, budget and schedule to ensure that we deliver a quality work at the lowest costs on time. We offer a unique client experience that includes constant communication with you through the entire work. We will work closely with you to make sure that you are completely satisfied. We are licensed and fully insured (General Liability Insurance and WSIB). We have years of experience and we have pre-employment screening. We use the best tools to get your work done right. If you have any questions regarding any of our services, please visit us at www.grandmerit.ca, give us a call on +1 (647) 556-5100 or email us at info@grandmerit.ca

profile:
With our painter's techniques and attention to detail, we can make your home and/or business look and feel more like your own. 

We are residential and commercial house painters painting in Pickering, Ajax, Scarborough and the greater Toronto area. We also serve the York and Durham regions to as far north as Aurora.

Our house painting services include general painting, plaster repair, wallpaper and wallcovering installation and removal, decorative painting, and faux finishes. We also offer more speciality services listed under the "Service Details" section below. 

Founded by award-winning decorator Walter Schellenberg in 1989, Decorating with a Difference has had the privilege of working in many of the finest homes in all of Toronto and the GTA, and has now expanded locally with the addition of his sons joining the business, and the partnerships he has created over the years. 

If you are interested in working with us to start or complete your project, please contact us and we'll respond as soon as possible, we look forward to working with you!

Note: 
In an effort to respond quicker, we have set up an automated estimate booking system on our website that will allow you the client, to choose the date that works best for you to have your project quote done in person. 

The system instantly confirms the appointment once you select the date so there is no need to wait for a call. That way you don't have to wait around for a reply, and we can keep painting without checking our phone.
products: We work with any brand of paint, varnish, stain, wallpaper or wallcovering that is required for your project. From low VOC paint for clearer air, to oil paint for that tough smooth finish used on doors and kitchen cabinets. We can even install grass cloth or silk wallcoverings.
services: General Painting, Wallpaper/ Wallcovering (installation & removal), Decorative Painting, Plaster Repair, Faux Finishes, & Murals.
brands: We work with Benjamin Moore, Sherwin-Williams, Behr, and Farrow & Ball to name a few.
specialities: Wallpaper/ Wallcovering (installation & removal), Faux Finishes, Decorative Painting, & Murals
name: Decorating With A Difference

profile:
DS Handyman Services was created to be a mobile trade service available to those who are in need of small repairs to be completed in their home residences. In this fast paced world, we are constantly on what I like to call “the roller coaster of life” trying to find a brief moments to share with our families, loved ones or even to take a few minutes for ourselves. 

Every day is beyond busy. Repairs begin to pile up, home improvements get pushed aside and sometimes curtains don’t even get hung up. DS Handyman Services was established to assist in those frustrating and forgotten projects. Sometimes the project feels too big for someone to complete on their own and an individual may feel more comfortable having someone else complete the project for them. It doesn’t hurt to ask or even get a quote. 
The estimates are free with no obligation to proceed. There are many trades available today that offer similar services but, unfortunately they are too busy, they don’t want smaller jobs or sadly, don’t even acknowledge the person’s inquiry.  In my opinion, there is nothing worse than not even being acknowledged. Time is a commodity for us now. When we take the time out of our busy schedule to inquire, this usually means we need the repair/project completed or we are excited to have it done. 

DS Handyman Services is designed to complete those projects in a professional way.
name: Ds Handyman Services
